website_summaries.verdict: A 12-inch portable TV that comes with helpful customer support. A good choice for camping or other outdoor uses.
pros: Does a good job picking up channels in most areas, and gets decent battery life
Has ample ports, a kickstand, and remote
Responsive customer service when issues arise
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the scale

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: A very good TV that can connect with our cable. Setting up was easy and quick,also I'm excited that it works with my game console by HDMI jack. Sound and picture quality is better than expected.The remote control is great and makes options easy to navigate..It can receive about more than 80 channels. It works in kitchen, outdoor, living room. I can put it anywhere in my house..I think it would be a good choice to give my friends as a present... By the way,although I had doubts in searching channels, Leadstar has provided excellent customer service and they helped us finish the seaeching progress. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Great buy if last longer had it for 2week was working fine the quit charging turn on for 1 or 2 mins then shut off by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV does what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: This little tv is amazing! Got it today, also took the warranty with it at a low cost. I put it through the paces this afternoon sitting in my car. It picked up the same public channels I get on the tv in my house. Wonderful HD channels for free. I'm about to take a 23 hour drive and plan on resting a lot on the way up. This tv will earn it's keep while I'm sitting in a parking lot. Both antennae's worked great! You can plug it into your cigarette lighter, a house socket, or a usb port. I definitely recommend it. I'm amazed at how good and easy it was. For me well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Fits the need.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a life changing device, and it's not supposed to be. I bought it to play my Xbox 360 in my small room and everything works just fine. The few times I actually used it as a television were very pleasant. It came with an adequate antennae that captured all my local channels. The viewing angles kind of suck, but the screen is bright enough to see outside on the brightest day, so that makes up for the viewing angles. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cristobal rendon

customer_reviews.title: Great little guy
customer_reviews.text: Replaced another small TV in my kitchen with this one...I get more channels now (antenna in the window) and the picture is crisp. Sound is a little tinny however I didn't expect Dolby sound so I'm not disappointed. It's great to keep me company in the kitchen while doing dishes or cooking so it's function isn't that complex. So far, so good. I've had it about 3 months now. I'm the kind of person that will come back and update my posts to make sure items last so I will update this post as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture!
customer_reviews.text: Using as a bedside tv it gives me a great picture with cable. I'm too far away from stations to get any broadcast reception with the portable antenna provided. I had to prop up the rear stand with a couple of drink coasters to get a good angle when lying in bed (needs an adjustable stand with a couple of fixed positions) and I wish it had more volume -- with the air conditioner running it's a little hard to hear. The headphone jack works well. The FM radio works well. Overall, I'm pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: 4WD4evry1

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV and monitor, and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture, good reception, lots of inputs, just the right size. HDMI can be used with computer or DVD player too. Adjustable folding stand works very well too. They also included an antenna that an be amplified through the TV, and that brings in lots more stations. I asked about an adapter for the non-standard VGA and they sent me one, great customer service, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this and seeing how it performs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 10" model. It came with a fat stubby heavy antennae that works really well. The TV set up itself with the channels automatically. The sound is weak but it does the job for a kitchen counter TV. One thing is that while changing channels it gets stuck on a channel (that is just a solid screen color) and becomes unresponsive to the remote. You can't change to another channel or turn it off. I have to turn the unit off with the hard switch and turn it back on. If this continues I will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim from SoCal

customer_reviews.title: only one brand cheap antenna works. UK August brand
customer_reviews.text: Was going to return it and got a surprise, The free upgraded antenna, a surprise gift , did not work. I had a $12,95 one coming from Amazon , because the upgrade was a surprise, Get the UK brand August. I get 28 channels, mostly clear, Just cancelled a $135 Antop, because I heard 28 channels is pretty good for $13, Hooking up Roku right now, Hope it works. Update, made a mistake, I use the DTA 240 for $16, the 245 is 12.95, There is a 8% coupon, got mixed up August DTA 240
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shedlock

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased to see that I was able to pick up a few channels right away, and then I plugged my roku stick in. Awesome! Also the company sent along another antenna for free, along with original antenna. I will probably pick up more channels if I place antenna closer to window.
customer_reviews.author: CjSun

customer_reviews.title: Worst LCD screen I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I realize it was $140 and it does come with a suction cup, antenna and some other accessories. They got a star for including a nice set of items. But the reason you buy it is to watch stuff and it falls down there. I've been using LCD screens since the late 90s. This is easily the worse I've ever encountered. The viewing angle is so narrow that you can't even watch something. Holding it about 18" away, if the middle looks good, the top and bottom won't. Holding it just 15 degrees to the top or bottom makes the screen unwatchable. I can't believe anyone makes screens this bad in 2020.
customer_reviews.author: N. Franke

customer_reviews.title: Unit has stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: This TV stopped working December 10 2018. It's past the return date but I'd like to send it back anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S. Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Portable TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV comes in handy when I need to workouts in a different room that doesn't have a tv monitor hooked up. Of course, I have to download all my workout videos onto a USB in order to plug it in the tv but it is handy. With this tv, I am able to take to any room to use or if my camping. I would recommend this tv for anyone who likes being outdoors but doesn't want to miss some of their tv shows.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is excellent. I like that the TV is like a tablet, and I can hold in my hands to watch if I want to. It has the ability to receive many channels. The antennas extends to make it more powerful. I have used this in Florida and in Illinois. Works great! Their customer service is excellent. Very quick to reply back to my questions. They take the time to understand my questions and challenges and provide helpful solutions and tips. Very friendly customer service - they definitely put the customer first! Wish more companies were like them!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Eng

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good, excelent battery duration came as descrived.
customer_reviews.text: I've been viewing it for a day and so far no complains with the antenna that comes with it I got 34 channels. however there is a newer small antenna that amazon sells and is 5v powered from the TV increases the channels in my case to 54. Decent viewing angle Battery charging time ~150 minutes and in my case, last close to 4 hours of viewing time. So far NO complains.
customer_reviews.author: Ray A

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent portable TV. Picture colors are truer than my first portable TV from another brand. Built in rechargeable battery lasts over 4 hours on a full charge (old TV lasted 15 minutes). They included a second antenna that’s a huge upgrade over the original one. It pulls in many more stations and works just as well as the high gain unit I purchased separately with my original TV. Love the built in stand and the included suction mount. The built in FM tuner is a nice bonus. I didn’t think I would use it but I do.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the speakers were better. Really like the size and portability. The picture is very clear and it picks up most of the local channels.
customer_reviews.author: Dianamarie

customer_reviews.title: Good screen but bad controls
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very good but the controls are annoyingly slow to respond and are not intuitive. The unit that comes with the FM Radio has the same good picture but much better controls. Get the one with the FM Radio.
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: Very clear picture!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV for my husband to use when our power goes out. Lost power recently during a play off game (football). Luckily this TV was charged and ready to go. Easy to set up. Very clear picture. Got 16 channels. Watched about an hour of the game and then our power was restored. Glad I bought it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: absolutly loved it
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son to keep him occupied while we do road trips he is 16. we loved it played his nitiendo switch played movies the antanas it came with was great got to see tv car charger and wall charging great volume or you can connect some little speakers in all we loved it and will definitly recommend
customer_reviews.author: shisa gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for under kitchen cabinet unit
customer_reviews.text: Accurate estimate of delivery, unpacking and installation was uncomplicated. Cable service set-up with ease. Picture color and clarity is very good for small display. Attached suction cup & adjustable bracket to small wood block and mounted it on underside of cabinet with screws rather than depend on suction cup. Only drawback is the audio: although treble and bass are adjustable, sound is inadequate for anything but a very small kitchen. I intend to use external speaker connected through the audio out jack provided on tv. Was unable to get cable remote synched up with the tv's functions.
customer_reviews.author: led

customer_reviews.title: Portable tv
customer_reviews.text: Take it camping and hook up the fire stick to it. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice set
customer_reviews.text: I can watch most local channels; it doesn't pick up channel 10 (Most popular channel in our area) but does the others very well. I did have to buy a high quality antenna for it though. Nice picture.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Tollefson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very much liked...brings in channels just fine if outdoors...not sure indoor because I put the antenna outside...also has for radio sound was fine but TV was mounted to the windshield of the car...didnt use the other functions but did connect the PS4 ran great...
customer_reviews.author: fatmonkey

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I JUST PURCHASED THIS TV IT WAS EASY TO OPERATE HOWEVER I DID NOT COME WITH A POWER CORD?JUST A CAR CHARGER AM I MISSING SOMETHING?NOTHING FROM THE SELLER I WOULD LIKE TO HAVE RECEIVED ALL THE PARTS THAT WERE SUPPOSE TO COME WITH THE PRODUCT LIKE A POWER CORD!
customer_reviews.author: V. jordan

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: It was a very satisfying experience. I had one of the best times of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this little TV!
customer_reviews.text: Best little TV out there, the remote isn't as sturdy as I would like, but I have NO complaints! I do not usually write reviews, but this little TV is better than my big TV!
customer_reviews.author: phender

customer_reviews.title: Pos
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Picked up very minimal channels. Waste of money..send it back! DO NOT BUY!! Plus, NO INSTRUCTIONS!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Newman

customer_reviews.title: Works best when within about 20 miles of the broadcast antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Works good except the included antenna does not pull in stations more than thirty miles away. Picture is very good if you watch head on. Will use on a coming trip in the next few weeks which will be the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in many scenarios. I fit the bipod between the backseat of my truck and works awesome. I bought an HDMI to my phone and it casts great to the TV
customer_reviews.author: Justin K

customer_reviews.title: As described!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new little tv. I bought it to use if cable goes out. I will use it with my fire tv stick. I also use it to check my outdoor blink cameras.
customer_reviews.author: SizzleStitch

customer_reviews.title: Leadstar 7
customer_reviews.text: This product performed like expected up to two weeks ago then all of a sudden I lost sound on NBC stations. I watch the Today show mornings to get the news/weather before. I start my day. I turned up the volume to 70 - could hear slightly but only barely , other stations seem to be OK.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Zebrowski

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work well moving in a vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This TV works ok if you are sitting in a house or stationary but if you expect to drive down the road and watch digital antenna TV you may be disappointed like me. I will probably keep it just for electricity outages at home. But they shouldn't imply you can watch tv while driving down the road. I even tried putting the magnetic antenna on the roof of the car. Still wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Edward A.

customer_reviews.title: Read the fine print.
customer_reviews.text: This is a LCD TV. Don't expect a good HD picture. Remote -tuner- inputs -build quality all Great. Poor LCD picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST RIGHT FOR YOUR DESK
customer_reviews.text: I work by myself everyday and like to keep abreast of the latest news and weather reports. This television is just perfect for my space and has a great picture, many choices of stations and my 98-year-old mom can listen with the earphones so that I can continue with waiting on customers without the television blaring
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cavender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my teardrop camper.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable 14” tv for use in my teardrop camper. It is easy to set up, the picture is superb, the sound quality is much better than anticipated and the price is right. I would highly recommend this tv for those who go camping and want to occasionally watch a movie or live tv on a rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: robs

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT FLY WITH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good product. Decent sound and picture and good for when you're traveling...however, do not take it on a plane. I flew from the States to Europe, tried turning it on to play some games and the picture is what I saw when I turned it on. I'd buy it again because it's a pretty good little TV, but I would not take it overseas again. Note: I put it in my computer bag with my laptop and was extra safe while getting it to and from, so that's not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Newberg

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Great small tv, wall mounted it in our campers bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: cmhowey2631

customer_reviews.title: My expectations were exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: With the help of the quick set-up page I was viewing stations without 15 minutes, and each station is remarkably stable and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mimereader2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for work. Very easy to setup and the antenna they included picked up a lot of channels with great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice little TV.
customer_reviews.text: TV reception signal sensitivity is pretty good and the picture quality is quite good, but the sound from the speakers is awful, weak and very "tinny" sounding. Too bad because it really detracts from the unit's overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mobile TV but needs an equally fantastic mobile antenna
customer_reviews.author: Eddie_D

customer_reviews.title: You may want this.
customer_reviews.text: To start,the qualiy is of the most upward. Arrived on time. Don't have anything bad to say about this TV. Great buy for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Word in Mind

customer_reviews.title: Big Item in a small box. Very good item. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 14 inch TV to be used on my balcony that was battery operated and that could use a coax cable. This item was exactly what I wanted. The picture sound and construction is so much more that I expected for a modestly priced battery/DC operated Television. It has all the necessary cables, charger and two sets of antennas to maximize reception in various locations.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture quality. Limited outputs. No charging instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Decent picture quality. No instructions provided on how to charge up lithium battery for tv. Limited outputs make it difficult to connect ipod to tv. Not sure yet how long battery will function before charging needed.
customer_reviews.author: KELLVYN M.

customer_reviews.title: USED!!! Come on
customer_reviews.text: The TV I just recieved from LEADSTAR-KD is clearly used with many scratches on the screen. I won't even power it up, it looks disgusting. Shame on you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Hooked up to a cable box, the picture is excellent at close range.
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up to cable television, the picture is excellent when viewed at close range. However, as you move back away from the screen the picture appears to darken. The television has an easel support which is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baril

customer_reviews.title: No reception anywhere....
customer_reviews.text: I had a tv but it broke. .I got 3 channels n loved it..this got NO CHANNELS AT ALL.. Very dissatisfied. ..maybe needs a better antena...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: purchase of additional antennas did not make any difference
customer_reviews.text: all the different antennas I purchased brought in the same channels.No instructions to show how to hold fm channels in memory.
customer_reviews.author: ronald m martocci

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU ORDER THIS MAKE SURE YOU GET EVERTHING
customer_reviews.text: ORDERED FROM AMAZON AND THE UNIT ONLY CAME WITH THE SCREEN AND NO OTHER PARTS TO OPERATE. SENT THE UNIT BACK TO AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: RONALD ALLIEGRO

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: BEST THING I HAVE BOUGHT. LITTLE PRICEY BUT QUALITY IS NOT CHEAP. BATTERY LAST A LONG TIME
customer_reviews.author: Arnold parisi

customer_reviews.title: You can use it anywhere you go.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and for my use with my RV camping
customer_reviews.author: parveen

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I just received this little TV and everything works as advertised (and all accessories including an extra antenna). Quality of the images is pretty good and the sounds in OK. I got 14 channels OTA without putting the antenna by a window or outside my RV. I purchased this for the RV and as a second monitor for my laptop when I am on the road. Would recommend this TV
customer_reviews.author: Francois G.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but would like to ask a question about how long to charge the internal battery and how long a charge will last. I have no phone number to call you. If possible I hope you can provide me a way to contact you. John
customer_reviews.author: john pernetti

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: It's working pretty good ,except the remote doesn't work but I don't care because I am using my Amazon fire stick this is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Manuel  J.  Vela

customer_reviews.title: Defective volume buttons!
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived defective the volume buttons are within the frame of the monitor you can not raise or lower the volume I would like to give more stars the concept of the product is very good but, I needed the monitor to use it with my cell phone via hdmi cable but I can not listen or manage the volume from the monitor
customer_reviews.author: adrenalin696

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This product is very terrible the sound was awful the picture was awful the build of it was awful the only thing I can say good about this product is that it turned on
customer_reviews.author: ronnie lujan

customer_reviews.title: Volume needs improvement...have to turn it all the way up
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv but the volume is not great....that needs improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Designs

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen TV Viewer
customer_reviews.text: We had a Philips under cabinets TV for about 7 years. It finally started funny stuff. This one works better and is great just using antenna input. Sound is a bit tinny but overall very good.
customer_reviews.author: walt

customer_reviews.title: you can only view picture at one narrow angle
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this tv except you can only view the screen at one narrow very limited angle and the sound is not very loud and the sound quality is not very good but I guess you could add external speakers
customer_reviews.author: KB2ROCKET

customer_reviews.title: antenna works great
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great. It give me the satisfaction of enjoying my patio and confinement to my back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Claude W Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kitchen, I really like it. Picture is decent, sound is clear, excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This TV was purchased for my mother who repeatedly stated how much she likes it. We purchased three products and she compared the sound and clarity of the picture and felt this tv was by far the best. Her only concern was the location of controls and the size of the remote. Overall it seems to meet her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! I love it so much! Display is great, perfect size, a must have!! I totally recommend this product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Essie Lee Goode

customer_reviews.title: The tv is not compatible with Dish recption
customer_reviews.text: The location of chabnels was low. This was due to my locaton in the country where the reception is low.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Nix

customer_reviews.title: Greatest mini tv you can buy
customer_reviews.text: This small sized led tv is incredible. I had another one, but the lcd screen was only viewable in certain positions. This brand tv is the best one to my knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just having someone to help
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time setting up my tv, could not find the help I needed. Had to wait on my son to set it for me.left my name and number no one called me back
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Allums

customer_reviews.title: Its just awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and it c9mes with so many goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Mica B

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty bad for him he can’t work it so just bad!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too hard for my 82year old brother to figure out and use! It’s for him he paid got it but since hf can’t use it it’d not much good for him.
customer_reviews.author: loretta grove

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months, battery will no longer hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months, the battery will no longer hold a charge. I've tried really hard to find customer service contact information. I'm hoping the manufacturer will read this review and get in contact with me.
customer_reviews.author: LWest

customer_reviews.title: good tv, will not play all MP4 videos
customer_reviews.text: will only play certain mp4 videos, some work others don't for some reason
customer_reviews.author: nathan hayes

customer_reviews.title: I Love it. Buy a power pack to keep you car batterie safe
customer_reviews.text: I have all my channels on tv. I even have channels I do not have in my house.
customer_reviews.author: gregory r miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love my Tv so much that I tried to place an order doe 2 more but Amazon says it isn’t available. If they come back In stock, I’d love to know
customer_reviews.author: K. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: The antenna that came with it works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up great viewing there’s a awesome antenna that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Free antenna
customer_reviews.text: Great tv for price. I also want to request the free antenna
customer_reviews.author: Knorock

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picture quality. My only concern is the charger feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Portability and features. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much, my wife loved it and was happy that I ordered it. I was surprised of all the features. Thank you for selling this product.
customer_reviews.author: michael a rodriguez

product_meta.title: 12 Inch Portable Digital ATSC TFT HD Screen Freeview LED TV for Car,Caravan,Camping,Outdoor or Kitchen.Built-in Battery Television/Monitor with Multimedia Player Support USB Card LEADSTAR
product_meta.description:
Color:12inch-WHY CHOOSE US?
We have various experience of factory TV, because we are the manufacture of portable car TV over 16 years.
-HOW TO USE THIS?
This is a built-in safe battery portable digital tv,we can watch tv everywhere.
When we go to camping,go to the seaside or do some outdoor,we can bring this small television.
As a cooking enthusiasts,we can watch video or program about cooking in the kitchen.
We also can watch tv when we are go to travel on the car or train.
-WHAT’S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN LEADSTAR SMALL PORTABLE ATSC TV and Other TV?/*-/*-
1.Safe built-in rechargeable battery for portable use.
2.High quality of the Led portable tv screen/panel.
3.Full Compliance with ATSC,Compactable with ATSC. 
4. With analog TV also, DTV in TV.
5. Design for car.
6.With USB jack, TF card slot, play the content of U-flash drive, support 1080P video, MKV, MOV, AVI, WMV, MPEG1-4, MP4, FLV, MP3, video, high birate decode. 
7. 110V~240V universal power supply,DC input low to 12V with more safety. 
8.High sensitivity tuner,strengthens the signal receptivity.
9. DTV support HD TV program recorde to USB flash or Hard disk--(PVR)funtion.
-WHAT’S THE SPECIFICATION OF THIS TFT-LED PORTABLE TELEVISION?
Display: 7"Color TFT-LED
Resolution: 1280x800 
Screen dimention ratio:16:9
Media formats support: rmvb,avi,mov,mkv,3gp,mp4 etc.
Audio:2*1W
Battery:Li-Polymer 7.4V 4000mAh
-WHAT’S IN THE PACKAGE OF THIS LED SMALL TV?
Remote control*1
Car charger*1
Stand*1
DC adapter*2
AV line*1
Mini Antenna*1
User manual(EN,ES,FR)
-IS THERE WARRANTY OF THE PORTABLE TV?
365 days warranty.
Support technical support
feature_bullets: 12.1" digital 16:9 screen with 1280x800 SD resolution; H.265 Freeview TV / ATSC TV (MPEG4) for USA and other countries,Our TV can be use in all ATSC countries
Long life LED Panel, Support play JPEG/MP3/MP4/MPEG/WAI/VOB/RMVB/AVI/MKV/M4V 1080P video by SD Card HDMI-in or USB.
Built-in 4000 mAh Li-Polymer, stereo loudspeakers and Earphone socket; DC power supply from mains (110-240V 50/60Hz)

FM function,Audio-video, input function;Super slim fashion design;Small screen for car or kitchen.(UN regulation power adapter,Manual(English/French/Spanish),antenna,remote control,Windscreen Car Mount Holder,AV line).
We are the manufacture of portable car TV over 16 years.Support technical service by 24hours Service online and 365 days warranty.
